message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the price of $9,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive offer.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to save a bit more money on this purchase.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my offer already reflects a fair price for the value this product brings.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8,800? I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure I can afford it.
